plugins.name: AI Assistant
plugins.description: Introduces AI tools for generating and improving content through the use of pre-defined commands or custom queries inserted by the user

plugins.name: AI Chat
plugins.description: Provides an interactive chat interface for AI-powered conversations with context awareness and model selection

plugins.name: AI Review Mode
plugins.description: Enables AI-powered content review with automated checks, suggestions, and diff visualization for content improvement

plugins.name: AI Quick Actions
plugins.description: Provides quick access to common AI-powered actions like improve writing, change tone, translate, and custom commands

plugins.name: AI Editor Integration
plugins.description: Provides integration between AI-powered features and the editor
